src:
Lamija skinula mrak u devetom kolu
Premijerni trijumf za ekipu Lazara Romanića

04 Nov 2019

U utakmici sa malo pravih šansi individualni kvalitet napadača presudio je u korist Lamije koja je zabeležila premijerni trijumf u devetom kolu grčkog šampionata.
Domaćini su dominirali protiv Volosa i na kraju se radovali minimalnom trijumfu od 1:0, a za odlučujući pogodak pobrinuo se brazilski napadač Tiram koji je u 80. minutu majstorski krunisao lepu akciju.
Bila je to kruna bolje igre Lamije u drugom poluvremenu, ali je blistao i golman gostiju Melisas koji je dva puta osujetio pokušaje domaćina. Dobru šansu za Lamiju propustio je i srpski internacionalac Lazar Romanić u 71. minutu, ali je domaćin na kraju ipak stigao do trijumfa.
Premijerna pobeda u devetom kolu povukla je Lamiju ka sredini tabele, ali joj Volos beži dva boda.

GRČKA 1 - 9. kolo

Lamija - Volos 1:0 (0:0)/Tiram 80/



Foto: Lamija
text:
Lamia took off in the ninth round
Premiership triumph for Lazar Romanic's team

04 Nov 2019

In a match with few real chances, the individual quality of the striker ruled in favor of Lamia, who recorded a premiership triumph in the ninth round of the Greek championship.
The hosts dominated against Volos and eventually rejoiced in the minimal triumph of 1: 0, and the decisive goal was taken by Brazilian striker Tiram, who masterfully crowned a fine action in the 80th minute.
It was the crown of Lamia's better play in the second half, but the away goalkeeper Melisas shone as well, which twice thwarted the hosts' attempts. A good chance for Lamia was also missed by Serbian international Lazar Romanic in the 71st minute, but the hosts eventually reached the triumph.
The premiership victory in the ninth round pulled Lamia towards the middle of the table, but Volos escaped with two points.

GREECE 1- Round 9

Lamia - Volos 1: 0 (0: 0) / Tiram 80 /



Photo: Lamia
